attributes.action: Give priority on council housing to hard working British families.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am starting this petition, because i feel it is completely unfair that the long term unemployed have one child after the other just to get a council house.
I feel they are being looked after like children, and they need an incentive to work.
I am also starting this petition, because i am annoyed at the huge influx of foreign families getting council housing before the hard working british familes, some of whom have been waiting over 10 years for a home.
